DOC.brief_summary: This study design randomize control clinical trial compare conventional orthodontic treatment ( control group ) piezocision-assisted orthodontic treatment ( PS group ) . Twenty-four consecutive adult patient Orthodontics Department Liege University Hospital , Belgium meet inclusion criterion enrol January October 2013 .
DOC.brief_title: Efficiency Piezocision-assisted Orthodontic Treatment Adult Patients
DOC.criteria: Adult patient ( complete growth ) Maxillary mandibular overcrowd Patient demand orthodontic treatment Adequate dentooral health ASA I ASA II Compliance clinic visit every 2 week A need tooth extraction A need orthodontic temporary anchorage device A history periodontal disease Smokers Altered bone metabolism ( e.g. , due antiresorptive drug , steroid immunosuppressant use ) Mental motor disability Pregnancy
